Reviews.Title: Phone order
Reviews.Author: ctuff
Reviews.Content: Received phone very quickly. That was wonderful. The only glitch is that the description said "like new" and there were many cracks and scratches. Full disclosure is always the best sales option.There is always a need for truth in advertising.

Reviews.Title: Would recommend.
Reviews.Author: Kerri Miller
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the product! Works wonderfully, easy to use and my daughter really loves the phone. They key pad makes texting very easy.

Reviews.Title: great phone !!!
Reviews.Author: Luis Miguel Perez Romano
Reviews.Content: fantastic phone, graphics interface very nice, i can see web pages like my computer, it software is very graphics and easy to use, it has a lot of aplications

Reviews.Title: AWFUL CRAPPY PHONE!
Reviews.Author: Maribel Mujica
Reviews.Content: Do not get this phone it sucks. Battery only lasts an hour when not using, and 10 minutes when using in for a phone call. It freezes and shuts downs.

Reviews.Title: t mobile g1 smartphone
Reviews.Author: Shirley Chamness
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone for my grand daughter and she really likes the phone, it just does not have all the features she had hoped for. I still give the seller 5 stars because when I called them and told them the battery was not holding a charge they immediately replaced it with a new battery. No complaints from the grand daughter now!

Reviews.Title: So In Love!
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: This phone has always been the phone I wanted. Was very excited to get it and was even more thrilled when I opened the package. The phone was used but looks far from used!!! it stills look brand new! I'm so in love with nothing different about it from the newer androids every1 kept telling me I was down grading but I feel I upgraded!

Reviews.Title: HTC unlocked G1 phone with google
Reviews.Author: stal
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone...Excellent phone...has everything you would need in a phone..If you"re looking to surf the internet..This google phone allows you to do that with wifi..You can unload free apps and games from the app market...Love it..

Reviews.Title: This is ridiculous.
Reviews.Author: Maddi
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone, thinking it was the one in the photo. Instead, I recieved a BLACK one and it was damaged to the point the screen was falling off. I understand I didn't pay full price and it would come with some wear and tear, but broken? Seriously? I am so disappointed, this was my fiance's birthday gift.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone HTC
Reviews.Author: Haruka-J
Reviews.Content: I love this phone is excellent and pretty cute, the only problems are #1 Is bulky as hell, #2 Battery life is not as great as you would expect it, with some occasional web browsing you will be out of battery by the end of the day #3 Wireless is sloppy takes a while to detect and reception could be better #4 Camera REALLY sucks... i expected much more from this device's camera.Overall is strong well built is very fast browsing and quite fun to use, you get used to android very easily and it really can take a hit. If you are a person 15-25yrs old who emails a lot and sms a lot and also likes the beautiful touchscreen THIS IS THE WAY TO GO it's amazing the amount of apps you can download and the browsing capabilities however if like me you need it for business use or want to sync your outlook contacts or work email DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE or you will find yourself in a nightmare because you WILL love it enough to want to keep it but HATE it because of the lack of compatibility with business apps.

Reviews.Title: Lost in transit
Reviews.Author: Joann Jackson "dbigyrl"
Reviews.Content: There has not been any miscommunication because all i said originally is that i hadn't received the phone yet nobody ever said anything about the post office losing the phone. When i submitted the notice that i hadn't received the phone i got an email stating that i was getting a refund for the amount of the phone never stating that the phone was not coming. I assumed that because it had taken so long that I was getting the phone on the company since I wasn't informed at that time that the phone was not coming. It is only just now that I have been made aware that the phone isn't coming. Now you offer me a measly 10% off a phone when i have went back and read reviews of your company and this thing has happened in the past with other customers. I would rather warn future customers of this possibly happening to them if they try and purchase a phone for your company.

Reviews.Title: not enough apps.
Reviews.Author: tylar
Reviews.Content: this phone is terrible i've had it for about 2 months and i hate it, its slow, has very few apps, restarts by itself, doesnt have a headphone jack,( that wasn't mentioned in the description) its just a all around terrible phone, the only thing its good for is texting.

Reviews.Title: t mobile smart phone
Reviews.Author: Kay DeTellem
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived in good condition and worked well as expected. I found that the cost was a good price for the product.

Reviews.Title: G1
Reviews.Author: Nicole Keels
Reviews.Content: My experience with this item wasn't good, the phone stopped working within 45days. I feel my money was wasted on the phone. And to add nothing has been done about it.

Reviews.Title: Tmobile G1
Reviews.Author: Tara Keefer
Reviews.Content: i like the phone, just don't buy it from Ross Cellular off here, they sent me the wrong charger, phone has knicks in it and it randomly shuts off on me while im using it, or even when I just sit it down on the table and come back for it a lil while later it turned off. I bought it refurbished and wished I would of just bought it new.

Reviews.Title: its alright
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: worked great at first, had to do factory reset...worked again for a short period of time now it wont boot past the start up screen. kind of a waste

Reviews.Title: I needed a phone
Reviews.Author: Whitney Philadelphia, PA
Reviews.Content: My motorola envy died on me and I needed something to hold me until I could afford an iPhone. This phone did just that. It's a no frills phone. The camera is pretty bad in comparison to what's available in the smartphone market now. It is the first android tmobile had so it has primitive smartphone capabilities. If you're looking for a REAL smartphone you might not be looking at this one anyway. If you're just looking for A PHONE then this is fine.

Reviews.Title: Below Expectations
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: Okay phone.... purchased it refurbished, but the keypad sometimes gets stuck and have to do alot of editing when trying to text. Also, can't hold many apps because so little memory and phone starts going really slow. Sometimes the phone has a hard time reading the sd card so I have to remove it, replace it, and restart the phone. A lot of trouble at times. Camera also not too good.

Reviews.Title: defective
Reviews.Author: footballgal09
Reviews.Content: When i received this item it was defective. I issues with it powering off randomly and then at times unable to retrieve the screen. This would have been my 3rd G-1. My first I loved i never had problems with it bought it directly from T-moblie over here in the US. My 2nd one was bought from Hong Kong over Ebay and it worked great for about 7 months then it began to have the same problems as this G-1 with the random power downs and the inability to retreive the screen after it's shutdown and at times unable to power back on. They also to have seem to suck the battery life right out of it something i never experienced with my very first G-1 so not sure what the problem is maybe it has to do with Foreign product I don't know.

ProductInfo.Name: T-Mobile G1 - Smartphone - 3G - WCDMA (UMTS) / GSM - touch / slide-out keyboard - Android - white - T-Mobile
